template.title: Load a public template
template.description: Load another user's creation to edit it as you wish.

save.title: Load a save
save.description: Use one of your saves to edit it or share it with others.

load.warning: Loading will clear any unsaved changes.

theme.title: Change the theme
theme.description: See how your messages look with the different Discord themes.

collaboration.need_to_save: You must save your creation before you can collaborate with other people.

error.title: Error saving!
error.message: An error occurred while saving your creation.

roles-icons-maker.name: Role icon creator
roles-icons-maker.description: Create your own role icons for your Discord server!

emojis-maker.name: Emoji maker
emojis-maker.description: Create large emojis to customize your server, your Discord profile or even your messages!
